FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s Struct Reference

The definition of a SD function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific SD driver implementation. More...

#include <FATFS.h>

Detailed Description

The definition of a SD function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific SD driver implementation.

Field Documentation

FATFS_CloseDrvFxn FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s::closeDrvFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

FATFS_ControlDrvFxn FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s::controlDrvFxn

Function to implementation specific control function

Function to initialize the given data object

FATFS_OpenDrvFxn FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s::openDrvFxn

Function to open the specified peripheral

FATFS_ReadDrvFxn FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s::readDrvFxn

Function to initiate a driver data read

FATFS_WriteDrvFxn FATFS_DrvFxnTable_s::writeDrvFxn

Function to initiate a driver data write
